kese wethath randenigala, moragahakanda, udawalawa, dambaulu oya, rajanganaya, nachchaduwa, nuwarawawa, parakrama samudraya, kawudulla wani waw saha jalasha rasaka jala mattama siyayata 80 ikmawa pawathima hethuwen adala pradeshawala jalasampadana katayuthuwala prabala badhawan mathuwa naha.kese wethath pawathina unusum kalaguna thaththwaya sambandhayen adahas dakwamin tharaka widyagnya anura si.perera kiya sitiye wananthara heli peheli kirima saha godanagili wishala washayen idikirima menma wahana bhawithaya ihala yama hethuwen kolambaa nagaraye unusumada ihala gos athi bawayi.

namuth mama sambandha wuye naha.
nathnam mata kiyanna thiyenne obath manasika rogiyek kiyala pamanayi.
eya mata oone aakarayata wenas karala anathurak karagannawa.
lowa anekuth ratawala kantha guwan niyamuwariyan puhunu karawanawa.
how how yanna kalin kiyanna oni wayiras thibboth dana fayil eke poddak hira weyi...

namuth, wanija nishpadanayak lesa mulinma nishpadana katayuthu arambaimata purogami wuye woshintange soyaganimayi.
dina siyak kakka sagare kalambaewwuwama mathuwune koththamalli...

me gamana sandaha sampurna bara pana daranne ohu wisin wana athara, anek aya nomile ema awasthawa sandaha waram lada aya wethi.

obage wyajathwaya heli wu wita siduwanne ithama pahalata watimayi.

eheth ee wenuwen kalinga maghage aakramanayen wasara dahathakma gathawana thuru bala sitinnata wijayabahuta siduwa thibini.
eyin kiri litar lakshayak mema wyapruthiya sandaha rajaya wisin miladi ganimata niyamithayi.
namuth oya kiyapu dewalin kisiwak guru puhunuwata adalawa labagath kusalatha neweyi.
namuth wancha karanna honda naha.
ehenam dansalenma patan gamu.
dinapathama wage kisiyam ho sathwa mansha kotasak aaharayata ganna pudgalayeku wana mata satheku marima boho wita itha asiru karyayaki karyayaki.
danata ohe duwamu.
menna me yugaye api lamayinta niyama lama natyayak kala yuthuyi kiyana mathaye hitiya.
ada me paddhathi boho durata wiyaki gosini.
eya itha dushkara jiwitha ratawaki.
danuwath kirimata thuthi!
(ji.dabliw.ke.premathilaka da silwa)

aththada?ajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansemaranaya da sathutin bara gannagunadharma kiyanne kumakatada?ekama kasiye depaththak thibekaradarakarayan sathuten jiwathwimakath ekkada jiwathwenne?diwi suraki mithuruthema...loku loku dewal gana katha karanawa wenuwata podi deyak karannasakman bhawanawalowada sangarawaudara naluwakuge jiwitha ranganayaobata ma kikaru kala hakida?paramitha dharmawaligalla pothgul wiharayaprabuddha nam wu granthaya rachana kirime di mahagamasekarayan wisin bhawitha karana lada sahithyaya sampradayan ha bhashamaya upakramayan nisa wyangartha ha dhwanithartha magin upa wignyanayaka pasuthalayak nirmanaya wi athayi pene.prabuddha kawya nirmanaya purama gala yana prema wruththanthayak ha athrupthiya, asahanaya, pashchaththapaya aadi aawarjaniya sankalpa samuchchayakata madi wu prabuddhage aathmaya thula uunapurnayak prarthana karamin siti.ohuge athdakim bohomayak udyogaya ha prabodhaya pinisa hethu wana prawanathawak nodakna labe.
